mapper.select: select m_motorcycle.moto_no , m_motorcycle.moto_name , m_motorcycle.seat_height , m_motorcycle.cylinder , m_motorcycle.cooling , m_motorcycle.price , m_motorcycle.comment , m_motorcycle.brand_id , m_motorcycle.version , m_motorcycle.ins_dt , m_motorcycle.upd_dt , m_brand.brand_name from m_motorcycle left outer join m_brand on m_motorcycle.brand_id = m_brand.brand_id where m_motorcycle.moto_no = #{motoNo} order by moto_no;
